thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Lisa Schack
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Lisa Schack

author: Lisa Schack
title: Lisa Schack
text:
The service I had at Town Fair Tire in Manchester was great! Neil was professional, cheerful and kind. He got me in and out quickly. I was there for a quick tire fix on a slow leak and found out the tire was bad... Neil was a great help in picking out the right replacement tire for my vehicle.
I have owned my 2014 Jeep Patriot since February of 2014. With every service at the dealership over the time I've owned the vehicle (3 years) I've complained that the vehicle pulls to the left and they have never been able to rectify the problem. I didn't bother saying anything to Neil but when I drove away I immediately noticed that the pulling had stopped. I am so grateful for their obvious expertise and I will no longer bring my tire issues anywhere else!
